name: Deep Blues vs. Cadence with a Warhammer
name_original: Deep Blues vs. Cadence with a Warhammer
description:
Deep Blues vs. Cadence with a Warhammer: The Asymmetrical 2-player Strategy Game Instructions:

Left click - Select character to move

Right click - Action (move/attack)

To win as Cadence, you must hit the king once; to win as Deep Blues, you have to hit Cadence 6 times.

Assets are from Brace Yourself Games.

Created for: https://itch.io/jam/gamejamdor
